actions.name: Queenly Majesty

cost.trigger: A creature declares a [Priority X] or [Interrupt X] Action.

actions.description:
Trigger: A creature uses a [Priority X] or [Interrupt X] action.

Effect: The triggering action fails and if it was an Attack, it is @Affliction[disabled] 5.

system.description:
Trigger: A creature uses a [Priority X] or [Interrupt X] action.

Effect: The triggering action fails and if it was an Attack, it is @Affliction[disabled] 5.
